title: SOB
description:
An old movie, but very funny.  A Blake Edwards production.

Nothing has been cut from it, all original menus, languages, special features.

Wide screen version

Synopsis: <right from the back of the dvd>

Felix Farmer (Richard Mulligan) latest movie flops - and lots of Hollywood types spring into action.  Agents are called.  Lawyers are retained.  Statements are issued.  It&#039;s what master comedy Black Edwards calls "Standard Operating Bull," the subject of his gleefully satiric S.O.B.

Julie Andrews is a wholesome superstar about to alter her image....radically.  Aiding and abetting the madness are William Holden, Robert Preston, Robert Vaughn, Shelley Winters, Loretta Swit, and more.  Dialogue crackles like fat in a fire, gags range from dead-on deadpan to cormedic broadsides, insights brilstle and sting.  Nothing standard here:  S.O.B. is extraordinary.


This is my first attempt to uploading anything on the bit torrents, so please don&#039;t judge me to harshly!  :)  Any helpful feedback would be greatly appreciated!  Hope you all enjoy this old classic movie....1981 release! :)
